Simulated Annealing Algorithm

Ref S. Kirkpatrick, C. D. Gelatt, Jr., M. P. Vecchi. Optimization by Simulated Annealing. 1983: 220(4598): 671-679

postprocess()¶
transit(*args, **kwargs)¶

The core method of the object.

The method transitating one state of the object to another state, according to some rules, such as crossing and mutating for individuals in GA, or moving method in Simulated Annealing.

transit(*args, **kwargs)¶

The core method of the object.

The method transitating one state of the object to another state, according to some rules, such as crossing and mutating for individuals in GA, or moving method in Simulated Annealing.
